item.title: Cole Palmer To Manchester United? England Star 'Would Welcome' Transfer To Boyhood Club
item.description: Homesick Cole Palmer would be open to a potential switch to boyhood club Manchester United this summer.

item.title: Pro Bowler Shedeur Sanders? Browns QB Will Reportedly Be Named to Pro Bowl Roster
item.description: Shedeur Sanders is a Pro Bowler. He's been named to the AFC's roster for the Pro Bowl Games, replacing Drake Maye.

item.description: There's a new favorite at the top of the board to win the women's Wooden Award. Here are the latest odds.
